summary: Adds a book that you can hit people with.
descriptionHtml: Tired of ignorant Nords and/or other uneducated scoundrels causing you grief on your adventures? Now you can beat knowledge right into them! Name inspired by Manual of Arms and Manual of Armor commissioned by General Talin Warhaft. Disregard other non-educational content in the pictures. This mod is only the book. You can craft it at a forge and it does as much damage as an Elven mace; knowledge is power kids!
author: ArchdukeofLandsee
